COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: I opened my eyes before my alarm clock rang.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106
STRING: I usually woke up like that on the day of a performance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112
STRING: I felt almost none of the nervousness that I had the
previous morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e
STRING: I just inhaled the fresh, crisp morning air and got up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162
STRING: [Phorni] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa
STRING: [Phorni] “Today is the recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6
STRING: Phorni said this while looking at me from the window. I
wondered how long she had been there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208
STRING: [Phorni] “Have you decided what you're going to do
after?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e
STRING: [Chris] “The truth is... Not yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you going to do like that? Didn't
Torta say anything?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270
STRING: [Chris] “We're going to talk about it from now. We'll talk
about things, and then decide.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac
STRING: [Phorni] “You're going to talk, when?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c2
STRING: [Chris] “Today. We're meeting here after the recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, so she's coming here. Umm... So you'll be
with Torta now, no matter what, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x314
STRING: [Chris] “It depends on what Torta says...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346
STRING: [Phorni] “You know what she'll say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c
STRING: [Chris] “I hope so anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: [Phorni] “So if Torta wants to, will you be together for a
long time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4
STRING: [Chris] “At least, I think so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d6
STRING: [Phorni] “I see. Then I'm relieved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: As if from the bottom of her heart... Phorni answered in
a more adult tone than usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x402
STRING: [Chris] “Why are you relieved, Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x434
STRING: [Phorni] “Because I was worried about you, Chris, of
course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x454
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah... Well I'm worried about you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x486
STRING: [Phorni] “Thanks. I am grateful, but I'm fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49c
STRING: [Chris] “How so?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ce
STRING: [Phorni] “I'll disappear soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e4
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...? Disappear?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x516
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh... That's not what I mean, I'd just be in the
way when Torta comes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x536
STRING: [Chris] “Even though you're always in the way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x568
STRING: [Phorni] “That's why. Today, at least, I should stay away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57e
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I guess I should thank you. Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b0
STRING: [Phorni] “Sure...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c6
STRING: It had gotten a little gloomy, but I still had time with
Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5dc
STRING: I'd take care of things with Torta, and then I could talk
to Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f2
STRING: I took off my shirt so I could take a shower, and started
getting ready for the day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63a
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I'll be back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66c
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, you're leaving already?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x682
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x698
STRING: Phorni called out to me from the table as I was walking
to the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ae
STRING: [Chris] “That was the plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e0
STRING: [Phorni] “Then can I ask you for something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f6
STRING: [Chris] “I don't mind, but it won't take too long, will it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71e
STRING: [Phorni] “Of course not. Can you put me on your
shoulder?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x734
STRING: [Chris] “Could it be, you want to come see the recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x766
STRING: [Phorni] “No. Just hurry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: [Chris] “Looks like I don't have a choice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: I put Phorni on my shoulder just as she asked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7aa
STRING: From the place where she could just reach out and
touch my ear, Phorni snickered lightly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c0
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, th-that tickles.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7de
STRING: [Phorni] “Just hold on for a second.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f4
STRING: [Chris] “I don't have to hold on for no reason.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x812
STRING: [Phorni] “There is a reason.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84a
STRING: I suddenly felt something touch my cheek.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x856
STRING: I was just a moment, like my cheek was brushed by hair
waving in a breeze.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x884
STRING: The next thing I knew, Phorni had glided down to the
table and was looking up at me as she spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b6
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, have a nice day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8cc
STRING: [Chris] “What did you do just now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fe
STRING: [Phorni] “It's a secret.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x914
STRING: [Chris] “A secret? Come on...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x946
STRING: [Phorni] “Hurry up and go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95c
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, but I want an explanation when I get
back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98e
STRING: [Phorni] “Too bad. I won't be here when you get back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a4
STRING: [Chris] “Then the next day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d6
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah-ha-ha! Bye-bye.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ec
STRING: I left behind Phorni, who was acting a little strangely,
and went outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1c
STRING: I still had a lot of time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa28
STRING: I didn't need to hurry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa34
STRING: The recital was in the afternoon anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa40
STRING: Since Asino's turn was the last of the afternoon, I could
practice for over an hour and even do what I wanted on
my lunch break.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa56
STRING: Most importantly, I had to warm myself up and play
over and over like it was the real thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab2
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, Chris! Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac8
STRING: [Chris] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xade
STRING: There were already no people in front of the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaea
STRING: The program began at nine o'clock, so most students
were either in the concert hall or practicing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0a
STRING: The graduation recitals would all be held over a week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb16
STRING: The first day was for Fortelle students, which would be
finished in one day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2c
STRING: There were just under two hundred third-year students,
but of course there were lyricists and the like that had
no recital, and the remaining majors filled the final two
days.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4c
STRING: The Fortelle students were split into thirty groups, each
given ten minutes including set-up time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb62
STRING: It was set up so that about half the students would be
finished in the two and a half hours in the morning, so
all the recitals would finish around four-thirty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb78
STRING: I'd be free until the night anyway, so my plan was to
watch with Torta until the end when Asino would play.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbaa
STRING: [Torta] “What are you thinking? There's no time, so let's
go warm up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbca
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc22
STRING: I kept the clock on the wall of the practice room in
mind, but threw myself into practice, and the next thing
I knew, it was already noon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc42
STRING: It must have been about thirty minutes before the
recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6a
STRING: [Torta] “Now, it looks like you can't help but get
distracted, so let's go to the hall early.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8a
STRING: [Chris] “No, I was doing it seriously.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca8
STRING: [Torta] “I'll give you that much. But you just kept looking
at the clock so I couldn't help but notice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc8
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfa
STRING: [Torta] “It's okay. We have to wait by the stage ten
minutes before the recital anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd92
STRING: Maybe it was the lunch break, as it was very quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9e
STRING: Normally I would have stood there listening to the
person before me perform, but since we were the first
act after lunch, all we could hear were people talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbe
STRING: Just as it was time for the people outside to go back
inside, I heard a door opening from far away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd4
STRING: The buzz grew after that, and my nervousness
increased.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde0
STRING: The curtain to the stage was still closed, so I got my
Fortelle set up so I could begin right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf6
STRING: All I had to do now was go on stage and perform.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1e
STRING: [Torta] “This makes me kind of nervous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe34
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe66
STRING: [Torta] “I hope someone I know is here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7c
STRING: [Chris] “Asino is still practicing. Desperately.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeae
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha! I bet he's catching hell from Ms.
Cordell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: [Cordell] “Unlikely, because I'm here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef6
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, Ms. Cordell... Good Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf28
STRING: [Torta] “Good Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf46
STRING: [Cordell] “I will be watching from backstage all day
today. Some students of mine are going to play.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf66
STRING: [Chris] “Right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf84
STRING: [Cordell] “Don't be so nervous. You should be confident.
I guarantee you'll do well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa4
STRING: [Chris] “Having you tell me that makes me feel a little
reassured.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc2
STRING: [Cordell] “Right. You'll be fine, too, Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff4
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100a
STRING: Torta answered with confidence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1050
STRING: The buzzer sounded, and I could see the hall get dark
through a gap in the curtain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1066
STRING: A voice announcing the recital program resounded, and
the stage curtain was raised.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107c
STRING: The Fortelle was already set up on the stage, so we
were lined up beside the stage holding only our sheet
music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ae
STRING: [Cordell] “Show them what you've got.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c4
STRING: Ms. Cordell whispered this to me and went out ahead
of us to further urge me on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110c
STRING: The applause was loud enough to hurt my ears, but it
soon subsided and the area around was filled with
silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1122
STRING: Even the sound of setting the sheet music on the stand
seemed to echo in my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1154
STRING: [Torta] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116a
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1188
STRING: [Torta] “Let's do our best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c2
STRING: Torta whispered in a voice that barely reached my ears.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ce
STRING: She wasn't really moving her lips, so I didn't think
anyone noticed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e4
STRING: Her words encouraged me, and I sat in the chair in front
of the Fortelle slightly relaxed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1214
STRING: Then Torta looked at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1220
STRING: Our eyes met, and we synchronized our breathing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122c
STRING: The time that took was surprisingly short.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1238
STRING: Because our feelings were already one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1264
STRING: Torta's voice rang out well in the hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1270
STRING: And so did the sound of my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127c
STRING: The two sounds mixed and we each boosted the other,
like the notes were changing into something else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1292
STRING: Changing into something that a voice or a Fortelle
alone could never achieve.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a8
STRING: Then they coalesced into a completed work, called
music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12be
STRING: We were nothing more than a part of that structure but
by virtue of that, the music itself was also us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d4
STRING: We accepted the waves that made up that sound with
not only our ears, but our whole bodies.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ea
STRING: It seemed to only last an instant, but at the same time
seemed to continue forever.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1300
STRING: Time passed steadily despite this, and my
consciousness was pulled back to this world.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1328
STRING: Then, the final note.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135e
STRING: With everything finished, the hall was filled with silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136a
STRING: And then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: Another wave of sound threatened to engulf us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x139c
STRING: This time it did hurt my ears and I almost forgot to bow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b2
STRING: I met Torta's eyes, finally bowed, and descended from
the stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c8
STRING: The applause didn't stop during this, and my ears were
still ringing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x141a
STRING: [Cordell] “Congratulations.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1430
STRING: [Chris] “Th-Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144e
STRING: [Cordell] “This might be the last time, so I'll give you an
honest compliment. That performance was truly superb.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146e
STRING: [Chris] “Wh-What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148c
STRING: [Cordell] “You two will do just fine as professionals.
That is how good that performance was.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c8
STRING: [Torta] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14de
STRING: Torta, too, was listening to Ms. Cordell's words
half-stunned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f4
STRING: We didn't know how to respond to such a straight
compliment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150a
STRING: No, it would have been best to accept it, but I couldn't
do that either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153c
STRING: [Cordell] “Why don't you try looking happier?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1566
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... I will when I get my feelings in order.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a2
STRING: [Cordell] “Fine then... You're staying until the end, aren't
you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c0
STRING: [Torta] “Yes. I don't think I can go home until I hear
Asino's performance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15fc
STRING: [Cordell] “I see. Anyway, you did a great job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1622
STRING: Ms. Cordell looked truly happy, and patted me on the
head many times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1638
STRING: It was the first time she'd done that to me, but she
looked truly happy, so I just let it happen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164e
STRING: Standing next to me, Torta seemed to have finally
grasped the situation and started timidly speaking to
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1680
STRING: [Torta] “It's over... It's really over.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1696
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c8
STRING: [Torta] “It was good, wasn't it? Our performance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16de
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1710
STRING: [Torta] “Huh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1726
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1744
STRING: [Torta] “I just... I feel spent.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x175a
STRING: [Chris] “Me too...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1770
STRING: I wasn't very nervous during the recital, but now that it
was over, and I had fully grasped the fact, my body
suddenly felt weak and my legs were shaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1790
STRING: It really was over now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179c
STRING: I could just relax and watch Asino's recital, then go
home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a8
STRING: And of course I had a lot of things to talk to Torta about
after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17be
STRING: But for now I just wanted to sit in a chair, and enjoy the
feeling of relief.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1874
STRING: With all the recitals finished, many people left the hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188a
STRING: We moved off to the side so as not to get swept up in
the crowd of people, and waited for Asino in the misty
rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18aa
STRING: We didn't have plans, but he would probably have time
to meet and chat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c0
STRING: This was also the only entrance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18cc
STRING: Torta and I watched the stream of people carefully so
as not to miss Asino, then a face I recognized noticed us
and nodded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1910
STRING: [Fal] “Hello.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1926
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Hello.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1958
STRING: [Fal] “I heard your recital. It was very impressive.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1976
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a8
STRING: [Fal] “I watched the whole thing, but you and Chris
were the best. I almost regretted I couldn't sing with
you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, um...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a04
STRING: [Torta] “That's a compliment. Accept it gracefully.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a36
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, of course. I'm sorry if it sounded a bit
ambiguous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a56
STRING: [Chris] “But your recital is tomorrow, right Ms. Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a88
STRING: [Fal] “Yeah. Vocal course recitals start tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a9e
STRING: [Chris] “Could it be... You plan to listen to every recital
this week?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ada
STRING: [Fal] “Of course not. Just the Fortelle students.
Hopefully it will help me after I graduate and become a
professional musician.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1afa
STRING: [Chris] “That's impressive...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b10
STRING: It seemed she already had everything decided after
graduation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1c
STRING: She talked readily about becoming a professional, but
Ms. Fal really could become one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b32
STRING: I didn't have many chances to play with her, but I knew
she had true ability.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b64
STRING: [Fal] “Well then, I'll be going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b7a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bac
STRING: [Fal] “I don't want to impose, after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bdc
STRING: Saying this, Ms. Fal disappeared through the school
gates.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be8
STRING: Then right after that, Asino appeared, out of breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c22
STRING: [Asino] “Look who it is!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c38
STRING: [Chris] “Asino, good work. You're a little late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6a
STRING: [Asino] “Ms. Cordell really gave me an earful. She says
I've still got a long way to go. What about you guys?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca6
STRING: [Torta] “She smothered us with praise, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cd8
STRING: [Asino] “No way...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cee
STRING: [Chris] “Really. She was in a surprisingly good mood.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d20
STRING: [Asino] “Wow... She's always different when it comes to
you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4a
STRING: [Chris] “Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d68
STRING: [Asino] “No, never mind. It's fine. I did the best I could.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d88
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. I heard you play, I thought you did good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dba
STRING: [Asino] “Thanks. But, with you being praised like that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd0
STRING: [Chris] “Ms. Cordell is strict, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e02
STRING: [Asino] “She is. It's not just that, though...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e18
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4a
STRING: [Asino] “Anyway, I'm in a bit of a hurry, sorry guys.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e60
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? A hurry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e92
STRING: [Asino] “I'm meeting someone. It's none of your
business, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ebc
STRING: [Chris] “It's none of my business, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eee
STRING: [Asino] “No, it's nothing... Anyway, I have to get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f18
STRING: [Chris] “Okay. Guess I'll see you next at the graduation
ceremony?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f36
STRING: [Asino] “You guessed right. Anyway, see you guys
around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f4c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f7c
STRING: We watched Asino hurry to the school building, then
we started walking as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f92
STRING: There were a lot of people right after the end, but now
there were so few you could count them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa8
STRING: Perhaps the students had plans to get together and
have fun after their recitals, but they were sparse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fbe
STRING: On the last day, the students would probably be more
exuberant, but the relative calm of the first day was to
be expected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd4
STRING: Regardless, none of that had anything to do with us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe0
STRING: I didn't have anyone I would call a friend beside Asino,
so I watched the group from the corner of my eye and
walked to the gate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202c
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, see you later tonight, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2042
STRING: Torta waved to me from the usual spot on the road.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2064
STRING: There was nothing more to say then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2070
STRING: We could talk later until we both felt satisfied.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2088
STRING: I started walking away, but something behind me
caught my attention so I turned around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b2
STRING: Torta was still in the same place, watching me with a
sad face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c8
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e6
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... I'll come see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20fc
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x211a
STRING: [Torta] “I will come see you, so wait for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2130
STRING: [Chris] “So... What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2162
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry, Chris... I mean, sorry for holding you
up, everything's fine!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2182
STRING: [Chris] “Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a0
STRING: [Torta] “S-See you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c4
STRING: Torta ran off not minding the puddles, leaving behind
only the sound of her footsteps.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21da
STRING: I felt a wordless unease, but if I believed her, there was
no problem.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f0
STRING: At least there shouldn't have been...
